scripts.docker:update: docker compose down storybook && docker rmi arthureudeline/starbucks-tp-kit-storybook && docker compose up storybook -d
scripts.switch:tp-1: pnpm run unlock:tp-1 && rm -rf src && cp -R tp-1/src src && pnpm run lock:tp-1
scripts.switch:tp-2: pnpm run unlock:tp-2 && rm -rf src && cp -R tp-2/src src && pnpm run lock:tp-2
scripts.switch:tp-3: pnpm run unlock:tp-3 && rm -rf src && cp -R tp-3/src src && pnpm run lock:tp-3
scripts.switch:tp-4: pnpm run unlock:tp-4 && rm -rf src && cp -R tp-4/src src && pnpm run lock:tp-4
scripts.pack:tp-1: pnpm run unlock:tp-1 && (cd tp-1 && zip -r - .) > zips/starbucks-tp-1.zip && pnpm run lock:tp-1
scripts.pack:tp-2: pnpm run unlock:tp-2 && (cd tp-2 && zip -r - .) > zips/starbucks-tp-2.zip && pnpm run lock:tp-2
scripts.pack:tp-3: pnpm run unlock:tp-3 && (cd tp-3 && zip -r - .) > zips/starbucks-tp-3.zip && pnpm run lock:tp-3
scripts.pack:tp-4: pnpm run unlock:tp-4 && (cd tp-4 && zip -r - .) > zips/starbucks-tp-4.zip && pnpm run lock:tp-4
